channel.title: New IPod Touch
channel.description:
What does everyone think about the 64GB IPod touch, with 3.0.1 firmware?
Personally i think it's a rip off for the other 8,32,64GB models because they charge quite a lot more, all they really did was add new firmware, which you could do on your other ipod touch through itunes for about $10.
[center][u][b]Pros[/b][/u][/center]
You listen to music, and now your music listens to you. The new 32GB and 64GB iPod touch models feature Voice Control. So you can tell iPod touch to play songs from a specific playlist or artist. Or speak simple commands such as “shuffle,” “pause,” and “next song.” You can even ask for the name of the track that’s currently playing (and hear iPod touch answer you).
Apple Earphones with Remote and Mic The new 32GB and 64GB iPod touch models come with the Apple Earphones with Remote and Mic, which are perfect for using the Voice Memos app and Voice Control.
Your very own private screening awaits you on iPod touch. Watch the latest film release or an episode of your favourite sitcom anytime you want. Store up to 80 hours of video and get up to 6 hours of video playback time on the new iPod touch.
[center][u][b]Cons[/b][/u][/center]
The Price differences are quite heavy considering that you could get an IPhone 32GB for the price of the IPod Touch 32GB/64GB.
Prices right now
8GB model is $219 USD.
32GB model is $329 USD.
64GB is [u][b]$429 USD.[/b][/u]
Apple doesn't sell 16GB Newer IPod Touch models.
In the end you win and lose, but i would still rather upgrade to an IPhone 3GS and grab myself a 32GB model.
Discuss.

item.title: New IPod Touch
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I forgot the downsides though:

There is no scrolling through your music, so it takes a while to browse through your songs.

There is no internet

There is no apps like the ipod, that is the biggest letdown.

But I got more then what I expected for the price.

Read full topic

item.title: New IPod Touch
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:2, topic:302788”]I have an 8GB Eclipse something or other with a touchscreen and a battery life that far exceeds the iPod. It also has the ability to hold a memory chip that can store, I believe, another 8GB. It also shoots video and pictures, as well as records voice, and has a radio along with a powerful onboard speaker.

It cost a grand total of 75 dollars and it is nearly indestructable.[/quote]
CHEAP!
Lol, I hate Iphones… But they need to lower the prices, its not like everyone wants one.

Read full topic

item.title: New IPod Touch
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I have an 8GB Eclipse something or other with a touchscreen and a battery life that far exceeds the iPod. It also has the ability to hold a memory chip that can store, I believe, another 8GB. It also shoots video and pictures, as well as records voice, and has a radio along with a powerful onboard speaker.

It cost a grand total of 75 dollars and it is nearly indestructable.

Read full topic
